description:
1. Did you ever want to write a book?, but don't have time I'm going to show you how to write a book using Apple's speech dictation aka Siri a simple little trick that you use in your life every day probably
  2. How much time will this take it depends but with Siri you can do it pretty quickly
  3. using words as a storyboard
title: magic with Siri a step by step to begin
